tag_list: search-engine-marketing, search-engine-optimization, web-analytics, interactive-marketing, web-strategy, conversion-optimization
overview:
Benjamin Rudolph is the President & CEO of Relevance Advisors, an interactive advertising agency based in Atlanta which specializes in search engine marketing, search engine optimization, and web analytics.

Benjamin spent four years at Comcast, where he managed the search partnership with Google for Comcast Interactive Media. In that capacity he launched the Comcast Toolbar and integrated multiple content sources into search including video, news, and yellow pages. Now he leverages his media and search experience to help clients maximize the value from their websites, both in terms of traffic and revenue.

Benjamin is a Google AdWords Certified Professional, a Microsoft Advertising Accredited Professional, and a SEMPO Individual Member. Benjamin has taught a senior seminar called The Search Marketing Revolution to the undergraduate business students at Emory University and is a member of the Emory Alumni Board. He is Past President and Co-Founder of the SEMPO Atlanta Working Group.

Benjamin is a Cum Laude graduate of Princeton University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Psychology, and he received his MBA in Marketing from the Goizueta Business School at Emory University.
